text:
"New article published in preprint on our site: the 2019-2020 season has so far been marked by a decrease in mortality linked to viral respiratory infections in the Marseille region (Giraud-Gatineau et al, 2020)."

#DidierRaoult #Hdroxychloroquine #Chloroquine #CoronavirusUpdates https://t.co/lMFyVapjtb
